channel.title: How do I Add Commands to My Server?
channel.description:
Hey, I was just wondering, how do I add commands? The only command I have so far is
::starter
:(.

item.description:
@_Paranoia wrote:

Yes, That would work for him…

Use ric914’s compiler, the ultimate compiler, ETC

Also, since you seem like a begginer in servers, I suggest you use a CMD Maker, and learn from that.

item.source: How do I Add Commands to My Server?

item.title: How do I Add Commands to My Server?
item.dc:creator: @elweb elweb
item.description:
@elweb wrote:

go into client.java search for “starter”
and underneath where it ends with a } hit enter once
underneaht put something like this
-ITEM GIVING COMMAND- note-change the playerrights to 1 if you want it for all players
else if (command.startsWith(“put your command name here”) && playerRights >= 2)
{
addItem(4717, 1000); //(itemid), (amount)
addItem(4719, 1000); //if you want to add more hit enter after the "and type additem(
}

-TELEPORTING COMMAND-
if (command.startsWith("(put command name here)")) {
tele(2897, 3618); // replace the x’s with coords
}

Read full topic
item.source: How do I Add Commands to My Server?

item.title: How do I Add Commands to My Server?
item.dc:creator: @MoparScaperDude MoparScaperDude
item.description:
@MoparScaperDude wrote:

Im sure there are MUCH more commands, but you just dont know them.

Search “ifcommand.” in client.java and you’ll find all your commands.

Adding custom ones, I believe once you have the code you can put it below any command.

Read full topic
item.source: How do I Add Commands to My Server?
